debug_flag.label: Debug
debug_flag.tooltip: This will log requests and responses in /var/log/ops.log
debug_flag.comment: Make sure the global Magento logging is also enabled.

pspid.label: PSPID
pspid.comment: PSPID is a case sensitive field

secret_key_in.label: SHA-IN Pass phrase
secret_key_in.comment: Refer to Ingenico Payment Services's backend in section Technical Information on tab Data and origin verification.
secret_key_in.tooltip: This must be identical to the value in the Ingenico Payment Services backend in section Technical information on tab Data and origin verification.

secret_key_out.label: SHA-OUT Pass phrase
secret_key_out.comment: Refer to Ingenico Payment Services's backend in section Technical Information on tab Transaction feedback.
secret_key_out.tooltip: This must be identical to the value in the Ingenico Payment Services backend in section Technical information on tab Transaction feedback.

mode.label: Mode
mode.tooltip: Depending on the selection the extension will communicate with the Ingenico Payment Services test or production service. Choose custom, if you have to use special urls for the gateway.
mode.comment: Please note that, after changing this value, you might also need to update additional fields like API-User and password, PSPID or SHA-IN/OUT pass phrase.

api_userid.label: API User
api_userid.tooltip: Special user for API must be created in the Ingenico Payment Services backend in section Users.

api_pswd.label: API Password
api_pswd.tooltip: Password which has been set in the Ingenico Payment Services backend for above API user.

payment_action.label: Payment Action
payment_action.tooltip: This setting will override the configuration in the Ingenico Payment Services backend in section Technical information on tab Global transaction parameters.

template.label: Payment Template
template.comment: If you choose "Ingenico Payment Services", you will need to fill in all the following fields.

html_title.label: Title of the Ingenico Payment Services Template

bgcolor.label: Background Color of Ingenico Payment Services Template

txtcolor.label: Text Color of the Ingenico Payment Services Template

tblbgcolor.label: Table Background Color of the Ingenico Payment Services Template

tbltxtcolor.label: Table Text Color of the Ingenico Payment Services Template

buttonbgcolor.label: Button Background Color of the Ingenico Payment Services Template

buttontxtcolor.label: Button Text Color of the Ingenico Payment Services Template

fonttype.label: Font Family of the Ingenico Payment Services Template

logo.label: Logo of the Ingenico Payment Services Template
logo.comment: URL/filename of the logo. The URL must be absolute and stored on a secure server.

redirectOrderReference.label: Order reference in case of redirect payments
redirectOrderReference.comment: See chapter 'configuration', section 'Magento - Backend in the documentation'. Please note that the option 'orderId' is not used the Kwixo payment methods.

inlineOrderReference.label: Order reference in case of inline payments
inlineOrderReference.comment: See chapter 'configuration', section 'Magento - Backend in the documentation'.

showQuoteIdInOrderGrid.label: Show Quote ID in the order grid

submitExtraParameters.label: Submit extra parameters
submitExtraParameters.tooltip: Only enable this if you wish to use Fraud Detection.
submitExtraParameters.comment: Enable this if you wish to use fraud detection

resendPaymentInfo_template.label: Resend payment information template
resendPaymentInfo_template.tooltip: The email template to use. Choose 'Default Template from Locale' to use Ingenico Payment Services extensions default template.

ops_state_restriction.label: Enable state restriction
ops_state_restriction.tooltip: If enabled the order status changes that differ from the expected status of the order for the Ingenico Payment Services status will get reverted. This can cause conflicts if you use custom order statuses.

ops_belfiusDirectNet.label: Ingenico Payment Services Belfius Direct Net

ops_openInvoiceDe.label: Ingenico Payment Services Open Invoice DE

active.label: Enabled
active.comment: Make sure that gender and date of birth are required fields in the checkout. Otherwise this payment method will not be displayed.

allow_discounted_carts.label: Title
allow_discounted_carts.comment: Allow payment method for discounted carts. Please note that not all aquirers support transmission of discount items.

ops_openInvoiceNl.label: Ingenico Payment Services Open Invoice NL

active.label: Enabled
active.comment:
Make sure that gender and date of birth are required fields in the checkout. Otherwise this payment method will not be displayed.
If AfterPay is the acquirer, it is not possible to perform partial captures.

brands.comment: Add one or more brands. In field "BRAND" you will have to enter the value you got from Ingenico Payment Services.

redirect_all.label: Enable redirect payment for all card types
redirect_all.comment: If set to Yes>, customers will be redirected to the external Ingenico Payment Services payment page.

inline_types.label: Enable inline payment for these card types
inline_types.tooltip: For the selected card types, the customer can enter the credit card details directly in the checkout.

enabled_3dsecure.label: Enable 3D secure
enabled_3dsecure.tooltip: If the customer's credit card supports 3D Secure, he will be redirected to an external page to enter his password.

backend_enabled.label: Enable for backend
backend_enabled.tooltip: This sets if this payment method should also be available for orders from the Magento backend.

show_alias_manager_info_for_guests.label: Show Alias Manager information for guests

zero_amount_checkout.label: Allow zero amount authorization
zero_amount_checkout.comment: Only if payment action is authorize.

ops_other.label: Additional Ingenico Payment Services payment methods
ops_other.comment: A generic payment method, that lets the customer choose the exact method on Ingenico Payment Services side.

title.label: Title
title.comment: This payment method always uses direct sale as payment action.
